org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene
Class LuceneBackendResources

java.lang.Object
  org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene.LuceneBackendResources

public final class LuceneBackendResources
extends Object

Collects all resources needed to apply changes to one index, and are reused across several WorkQueues.

Author:
Sanne Grinovero

onTheFlyRebuild

public LuceneBackendResources onTheFlyRebuild()
Creates a replacement for this same LuceneBackendResources: reuses the existing locks and executors (which can't be reconfigured on the fly), reuses the same Workspace and ErrorHandler, but will use a new LuceneWorkVisitor. The LuceneWorkVisitor contains the strategies we use to apply update operations on the index, and we might need to change them after the backend is started.

Returns:
the new LuceneBackendResources to replace this one.
